Effect: Adverse Subsist Situation.name: Efecto: Situación adversa de subsistencia
Effect: Adverse Subsist Situation.description: Atrajiste problemas, comiste algo que no debías o empeoraste tu situación de otra manera. Recibes una penalización de -2 por circunstancia a las pruebas para Subsistir durante 1 semana. No encontraste comida en absoluto; si no tienes nada almacenado, corres el peligro de morir de hambre o de sed si continúas fallando.

Effect: Aid.name: Efecto: Prestar ayuda
Effect: Aid.description: Obtienes un bonificador de circunstancia a la prueba de ayuda en función del resultado de la prueba de Prestar ayuda de tu aliado.

Effect: Ancestral Might.name: Effect: Ancestral Might
Effect: Ancestral Might.description:
Granted by @UUID[Compendium.pf2e.journals.JournalEntry.BSp4LUSaOmUyjBko.JournalEntryPage.quxPxuMub8k6abzN]{Ancestral Might}

Until the start of your next turn, you gain a +2 status bonus to checks based on the attributes that are boosted by your ancestry (ignoring free boosts). If your ancestry only grants free boosts, select one attribute to gain the bonus to instead.

Effect: Aquatic Combat.name: Efecto: Combate Acuático
Effect: Aquatic Combat.description:
Usa estas reglas para batallas en el agua o bajo el agua:

  • Eres @UUID[Compendium.pf2e.conditionitems.Item.AJh5ex99aV6VTggg]{Desprevenido} a menos que tengas velocidad de nado.
  • Obtienes resistencia 5 al ácido y al fuego.
  • Recibes una penalización de circunstancia de -2 a los ataques cuerpo a cuerpo cortantes o contundentes que atraviesen el agua.
  • Los ataques a distancia que causan daño contundente o cortante fallan automáticamente si el atacante o el objetivo estáLos incrementos de alcance se reducen a la mitad.
  • No puedes lanzar hechizos de fuego ni usar acciones con el rasgo de fuego bajo el agua.
  • A discreción del DJ, algunas acciones terrestres podrían no funcionar bajo el agua o mientras flotas.

Effect: Aura of Protection.name: Effect: Aura of Protection
Effect: Aura of Protection.description:
Granted by @UUID[Compendium.pf2e.journals.JournalEntry.BSp4LUSaOmUyjBko.JournalEntryPage.7uERHpfJplGtYf8w]{Aura of Protection}

Until the start of your next turn, you gain resistance to all damage equal to the rank of the spell that you just cast.

Effect: Avert Gaze.name: Efecto: evitar la mirada
Effect: Avert Gaze.description: Has desviado la mirada del peligro, como la mirada de una medusa. Obtienes una bonificación de circunstancia +2 a las salvaciones contra habilidades visuales que requieren que mires a una criatura u objeto, como la mirada petrificante de una medusa.

Effect: Called Foe.name: Effect: Called Foe
Effect: Called Foe.description:
Granted by @UUID[Compendium.pf2e.journals.JournalEntry.BSp4LUSaOmUyjBko.JournalEntryPage.spzRl5CS4vnvcrm5]{Called Foe}

Designate a foe that you can see. You gain a +2 status bonus to attack rolls made against that foe, but you take a -4 status penalty to attack rolls made against any other creature. This lasts until the end of your next turn or until you critically hit the designated foe, whichever comes first.

Effect: Catch your Breath.name: Effect: Catch your Breath
Effect: Catch your Breath.description:
Granted by @UUID[Compendium.pf2e.journals.JournalEntry.BSp4LUSaOmUyjBko.JournalEntryPage.LafJ1PXfnR4Ogyzh]{Catch your Breath}

The creature you choose must have fewer than half their total Hit Points. The creature gains a number of temporary Hit Points equal to twice your level, which last until the end of the combat.

Effect: Class Might.name: Effect: Class Might
Effect: Class Might.description:
Granted by @UUID[Compendium.pf2e.journals.JournalEntry.BSp4LUSaOmUyjBko.JournalEntryPage.a68Phr1qsqVRPMVp]{Class Might}

Until the start of your next turn you gain a +2 status bonus to checks based on the key attribute of your class. If your class grants a choice for its key attribute, select one of those attributes to gain the bonus.

Effect: Cover.name: Efecto: Cubrir
Effect: Cover.description: Cuando estás detrás de un obstáculo que podría bloquear armas, protegerte contra explosiones y hacerte más difícil de detectar, estás a cubierto. La cobertura estándar te otorga una bonificación de circunstancia de +2 a la CA, a las salvaciones de reflejos contra efectos de área y a las pruebas de sigilo para esconderte, escabullirte o evitar la detección. Puedes aumentar esto a una mayor cobertura usando la acción básica Cubrirse, aumentando la bonificación de circunstancia a +4. Si la cobertura es especialmente ligera, normalmente cuando la proporciona uncriatura, tienes menos cobertura, lo que otorga una bonificación de circunstancia +1 a la CA. Una criatura con cobertura estándar o mayor puede intentar usar Sigilo para esconderse, pero una cobertura menor no es suficiente.

Effect: Critical Moment.name: Effect: Critical Moment
Effect: Critical Moment.description:
Granted by @UUID[Compendium.pf2e.journals.JournalEntry.BSp4LUSaOmUyjBko.JournalEntryPage.P3mSUWRvCCwEouB0]{Critical Moment}

Reroll the check twice and take the best result. This is a fortune effect. If you still fail this check, you become @UUID[Compendium.pf2e.conditionitems.Item.3uh1r86TzbQvosxv]{Condenado 1}.

Effect: Daring Attempt.name: Effect: Daring Attempt
Effect: Daring Attempt.description:
Granted by @UUID[Compendium.pf2e.journals.JournalEntry.BSp4LUSaOmUyjBko.JournalEntryPage.jHn1m1r95YgMQSvM]{Daring Attempt}

Select one untrained skill. You are trained in that skill until the end of your next turn. If you use that skill before the end of your next turn and succeed at your skill check, you keep this benefit until the end of the combat, or for 1 minute if not in combat.

Effect: Dazzled until end of your next t.name: Efecto: Deslumbrado hasta el final de tu siguiente turno.
Effect: Dazzled until end of your next t.description:
Efecto aplicado por @UUID[Compendium.pf2e.criticaldeck.JournalEntry.mwz1Ukw9laGyRocF]{Critical Fumble Deck #51} , @UUID[Compendium.pf2e.criticaldeck.JournalEntry.dvL063pJYJpCMsA6]{Critical Fumble Deck #52}

Eres @UUID[Compendium.pf2e.conditionitems.Item.TkIyaNPgTZFBCCuh]{Deslumbrado} hasta el final de tu siguiente turno.

Effect: Deafened until end of your next.name: Efecto: Ensordecido hasta el final de tu siguiente turno.
Effect: Deafened until end of your next.description:
Efecto aplicado por @UUID[Compendium.pf2e.criticaldeck.JournalEntry.mcniWnifXwXkZocv]{Critical Fumble Deck #41}

Eres @UUID[Compendium.pf2e.conditionitems.Item.9PR9y0bi4JPKnHPR]{Ensordecido} hasta el final de tu siguiente turno.

Effect: Desperate Swing.name: Effect: Desperate Swing
Effect: Desperate Swing.description:
Granted by @UUID[Compendium.pf2e.journals.JournalEntry.BSp4LUSaOmUyjBko.JournalEntryPage.d15Zjdqplmj7ZTKK]{Desperate Swing}

Make a Strike, ignoring the multiple attack penalty. If you roll a critical success, you get a normal success instead. If the attack fails, you release your weapon, or drop Prone if you were using an unarmed attack or otherwise can't release your weapon.

Effect: Endure the Onslaught.name: Effect: Endure the Onslaught
Effect: Endure the Onslaught.description:
Granted by @UUID[Compendium.pf2e.journals.JournalEntry.BSp4LUSaOmUyjBko.JournalEntryPage.TU21DvdpQG7U2Q9Y]{Endure the Onslaught}

Give a creature you can see resistance 5 to all damage until the start of your next turn. If you are 7th level or higher, the resistance is 10, and if you are 12th level or higher, the resistance is 15.

Effect: Fluid Motion.name: Effect: Fluid Motion
Effect: Fluid Motion.description:
Granted by @UUID[Compendium.pf2e.journals.JournalEntry.BSp4LUSaOmUyjBko.JournalEntryPage.D6hqfmZUksRvqNFR]{Fluid Motion}

For the rest of your turn, you gain a climb Speed and a swim Speed equal to half your Speed. If you make a horizontal Leap, increase the distance jumped by 10 feet.

Effect: Follow The Expert.name: Efecto: seguir al experto
Effect: Follow The Expert.description:
Granted by @UUID[Compendium.pf2e.actionspf2e.Item.tfa4Sh7wcxCEqL29]{Follow the Expert}

You can add your level as a proficiency bonus to the associated skill check, even if you're untrained. Additionally, you gain a circumstance bonus to your skill check based on your ally's proficiency.

Effect: Impossible Shot.name: Effect: Impossible Shot
Effect: Impossible Shot.description:
Granted by @UUID[Compendium.pf2e.journals.JournalEntry.BSp4LUSaOmUyjBko.JournalEntryPage.k0ue81dFKH4OKxed]{Impossible Shot}

If you're attempting a Strike, double the range increment of the weapon or unarmed attack. If you're Casting a Spell, increase the range of the spell by half.

Effect: Mounted.name: Efecto: Montado
Effect: Mounted.description: Recibes una penalización de circunstancia de -2 a las salvaciones de Reflejos mientras estás montado.

Effect: Off-Guard until end of your next.name: Efecto: Fuera de guardia hasta el final de tu próximo turno
Effect: Off-Guard until end of your next.description:
Efecto aplicado por @UUID[Compendium.pf2e.criticaldeck.JournalEntry.IrUeMJoKEYUSJKs1]{Critical Fumble Deck #19} , @UUID[Compendium.pf2e.criticaldeck.JournalEntry.gWa7wGUfUvYoIK8z]{Critical Fumble Deck #20} , @UUID[Compendium.pf2e.criticaldeck.JournalEntry.I5omhoK6rqfCZiUZ]{Critical Fumble Deck #21} , @UUID[Compendium.pf2e.criticaldeck.JournalEntry.Ps9VYxI2zJPG6PEV]{Critical Fumble Deck #22} , @UUID[Compendium.pf2e.criticaldeck.JournalEntry.qD8KoshDJsayGbCB]{Critical Fumble Deck #40}

Eres @UUID[Compendium.pf2e.conditionitems.Item.AJh5ex99aV6VTggg]{Desprevenido} hasta el final de tu siguiente turno.

Effect: Rage and Fury.name: Effect: Rage and Fury
Effect: Rage and Fury.description:
Granted by @UUID[Compendium.pf2e.journals.JournalEntry.BSp4LUSaOmUyjBko.JournalEntryPage.cQH9Syl1SQpbAi5A]{Rage and Fury}

At the start of your next turn, you enter a rage (+2 damage to melee strikes, -1 AC penalty).

Effect: Resistance 5 to all damage.name: Efecto: Resistencia 5 a todo daño.
Effect: Resistance 5 to all damage.description:
Efecto aplicado por @UUID[Compendium.pf2e.criticaldeck.JournalEntry.TYTNFtVvFqFBM8oy]{Critical Fumble Deck #43}

Resistencia 5 a todo daño

Effect: Scout.name: Effect: Scout
Effect: Scout.description:
Granted by @UUID[Compendium.pf2e.actionspf2e.Item.kV3XM0YJeS2KCSOb]{Scout}

You gain a +1 circumstance bonus to your initiative roll.

Effect: Spark of Courage.name: Effect: Spark of Courage
Effect: Spark of Courage.description:
Granted by @UUID[Compendium.pf2e.journals.JournalEntry.BSp4LUSaOmUyjBko.JournalEntryPage.EZZxz9jeEB0N3FPZ]{Spark of Courage}

You gain a +2 status bonus to attack rolls and skill checks until the end of your next turn.

Effect: Strike True.name: Effect: Strike True
Effect: Strike True.description:
The target rolls twice and takes the higher result. This strike deals an extra die of damage on a hit if the attacker has fewer than half their maximum Hit Points, or two extra dice if they have fewer than one quarter their maximum Hit Points. This is a fortune effect.

@UUID[Compendium.pf2e.other-effects.Item.l9bMRAoKnFP8vb3D]{Effect: Strike True}

Effect: Treat Disease.name: Effect: Treat Disease
Effect: Treat Disease.description:
Granted by @UUID[Compendium.pf2e.actionspf2e.Item.TC7OcDa7JlWbqMaN]{Treat Disease}

You gain a circumstance bonus or penalty to your next save against the disease.

Effect: Treat Poison.name: Effect: Treat Poison
Effect: Treat Poison.description:
Granted by @UUID[Compendium.pf2e.actionspf2e.Item.KjoCEEmPGTeFE4hh]{Treat Poison}

You gain a circumstance bonus or penalty to your next save against the poison.
